name: core/paragraph
originalContent: In 1996, Bill Gates made a bold statement.

attributes.content: In 1996, Bill Gates made a bold statement.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​He declared that “C​ontent is King.” He foresaw the internet evolving into a marketingplace for content.

attributes.content: ​He declared that “C​ontent is King.” He foresaw the internet evolving into a marketingplace for content.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​Over 20 years later, Gates premonition is proving right.

attributes.content: ​Over 20 years later, Gates premonition is proving right.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: So, how far have we come concerning the production and consumption of content? This collection of stats below reveals the amount of content shared and consumed.

attributes.content: So, how far have we come concerning the production and consumption of content? This collection of stats below reveals the amount of content shared and consumed.

name: core/list
originalContent:
• 400 hours of video content is shared.
  • 347,222 tweets are sent.
  • Facebook users like posts 4,166,667 times.
  • Instagram users like posts 2,430,555 times.

attributes.values:
• 400 hours of video content is shared.
  • 347,222 tweets are sent.
  • Facebook users like posts 4,166,667 times.
  • Instagram users like posts 2,430,555 times.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: While the volume is high, what is the outcome?

attributes.content: While the volume is high, what is the outcome?

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​Savvy marketers are moving past the “more is better” mentality to focus on quality.

attributes.content: ​Savvy marketers are moving past the “more is better” mentality to focus on quality.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: Is this content actually helping marketers and businesses meet their goals?

attributes.content: Is this content actually helping marketers and businesses meet their goals?

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​This is where Content Intelligence comes into play.

attributes.content: ​This is where Content Intelligence comes into play.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: What is Content Intelligence?

attributes.content: What is Content Intelligence?

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: Content Intelligence is the intersection of artificial intelligence and content strategy.

attributes.content: Content Intelligence is the intersection of artificial intelligence and content strategy.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: Defined as, "technology that helps content understand itself — what it’s about, how it speaks, how effective it is at accomplishing certain goals, what emotions it calls to mind, etc.”

attributes.content: Defined as, "technology that helps content understand itself — what it’s about, how it speaks, how effective it is at accomplishing certain goals, what emotions it calls to mind, etc.”

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​Content Intelligence offers marketers a holistic view into the language of their content and allows them to make better decisions about the context of their content.

attributes.content: ​Content Intelligence offers marketers a holistic view into the language of their content and allows them to make better decisions about the context of their content.

name: core/image
core/paragraph
originalContent: It can help marketers better understand the type of content they should share, how they should promote it, and which content needs updating.

attributes.content: It can help marketers better understand the type of content they should share, how they should promote it, and which content needs updating.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​It dives deeper than just page views and social shares, focusing on the actual data associated with the content.

attributes.content: ​It dives deeper than just page views and social shares, focusing on the actual data associated with the content.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: Software options like Marketo and Atomic Reach are allowing marketers to go deeper with data to make even better content marketing decisions.

attributes.content: Software options like Marketo and Atomic Reach are allowing marketers to go deeper with data to make even better content marketing decisions.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​So, how else does content intelligence impact content marketing?

attributes.content: ​So, how else does content intelligence impact content marketing?

name: core/image
core/paragraph
originalContent: ​Properly Identifying and Targeting Audiences

attributes.content: ​Properly Identifying and Targeting Audiences

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: According to Curata, 67% of marketers list audience identification and targeting as a top need from a content marketing perspective.

attributes.content: According to Curata, 67% of marketers list audience identification and targeting as a top need from a content marketing perspective.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: Instead of just relying on surveys, Google Analytics, or CRMs, a content intelligence platform uses all of them.

attributes.content: Instead of just relying on surveys, Google <armarker data-markjs="true" class="arSpellingGrammar" id="spelling_id_4" data-spelling-issue-id="4">Analytics</armarker>, or CRMs, a content intelligence platform uses all of them.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​It drills down into your data related to demographics, customer preferences, and insights from historical content to help you produce content your audience will resonate with.

attributes.content: ​It drills down into your data related to demographics, customer preferences, and insights from historical content to help you produce content your audience will resonate with.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: Guides Customers Through the Journey

attributes.content: Guides Customers Through the Journey

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: To say that competition is fierce would be an understatement.

attributes.content: To say that competition is fierce would be an understatement.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​Today, marketers are challenged with moving past guesswork to produce the right content for the right audience.

attributes.content: ​Today, marketers <armarker data-markjs="true" class="arSpellingGrammar" id="spelling_id_5" data-spelling-issue-id="5">are challenged</armarker> with moving past guesswork to produce the right content for the right audience.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​A well-thought-out marketing strategy that utilizes content intelligence ensures this happens.

attributes.content: ​A well-thought-out marketing strategy that utilizes content intelligence ensures this happens.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​It can help you create content that cultivates customers throughout each part of the buyer journey.

attributes.content: ​It can help you create content that cultivates customers throughout each part of the buyer journey.

name: core/image
core/paragraph
originalContent: ​You can then send targeted email messages that invite them to come in for scheduled maintenance with an attached blog post on the importance of car upkeep.

attributes.content: ​You can then send targeted email messages that invite them to come in for scheduled maintenance with an attached blog post on <armarker data-markjs="true" class="arSpellingGrammar" id="spelling_id_6" data-spelling-issue-id="6">the importance of</armarker> car upkeep.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​Efforts like this reveal that content intelligence helps you to produce content that is valuable to your customers.

attributes.content: ​Efforts like this reveal that content intelligence helps you to produce content that is valuable to your customers.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: Knowing the Best Content to Create for Your Audience

attributes.content: Knowing the Best Content to Create for Your Audience

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: As enticing as content brainstorming sessions are, it is inefficient to rely on these sessions.

attributes.content: As enticing as content brainstorming sessions are, it is inefficient to rely on these sessions.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​You need a platform that can help you quickly and efficiently understand the type of content your audience is looking for.

attributes.content: ​You need a platform that can help you quickly and efficiently understand the type of content your audience is looking for.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​If you have set goals and are funneling the right data to your content intelligence platform, then it can help you overcome this obstacle.

attributes.content: ​If you have set goals and are funneling the right data to your content intelligence platform, then it can help you overcome this obstacle.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: It can take your goals and data and look at content in your industry that is popular with customers. From there, it can also examine what competitors are doing to provide you with helpful insights into the topics you should be covering.

attributes.content: It can take your goals and data and look at content in your industry that is popular with customers. From there, it can also examine what competitors are doing to provide you with helpful insights into the topics you <armarker data-markjs="true" class="arSpellingGrammar" id="spelling_id_7" data-spelling-issue-id="7">should be</armarker> covering.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​While there will always be a need for the human element of creating content that adequately appeals to emotions and logic, machine learning and AI can help you reach the first step of where to start.

attributes.content: ​While there will always be a need for the human element of creating content that adequately appeals to emotions and logic, machine learning and AI can help you reach the first step of where to start.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: Determining the Best Time to Distribute and Promote Your Content

attributes.content: Determining the Best Time to Distribute and Promote Your Content

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: According to Curata, 53% of marketers say distribution is a top need related to content marketing.

attributes.content: According to Curata, 53% of marketers say distribution is a top need related to content marketing.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​In a world of ever-evolving consumer preferences, and a never-ending option of social media platforms, it is challenging to know where and when your audience wants to see your content.

attributes.content: ​In a world of ever-evolving consumer preferences, and a never-ending option of social media platforms, it is challenging to know where and when your audience wants to see your content.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​Is half your audience on Twitter, while your most dedicated buyers are on LinkedIn?

attributes.content: ​Is half your audience on Twitter, while your most dedicated buyers are on LinkedIn?

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: Many marketers still rely on dated methods for discovering this information, rather than using data.

attributes.content: Many marketers still rely on dated methods for discovering this information, rather than using data.

name: core/image
core/paragraph
originalContent: ​Content Intelligence can assist you by using data to ensure your audience actually sees what you are producing.

attributes.content: ​Content Intelligence can assist you by using data to ensure your audience actually sees what you are producing.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​It looks at historical content and uses data to determine the best time and where to promote your content.

attributes.content: ​It looks at historical content and uses data to determine the best time and where to promote your content.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: Identify How To Improve Your Content

attributes.content: Identify How To Improve Your Content

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: There is no silver bullet when it comes to content marketing.

attributes.content: There is no silver bullet when it comes to content marketing.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​The data sources can always be better, the content can be even more targeted, and the topics can be even more relevant. In short, there is room to improve your content marketing strategy.

attributes.content: ​The data sources can always be better, the content <armarker data-markjs="true" class="arSpellingGrammar" id="spelling_id_8" data-spelling-issue-id="8">can be</armarker> even more targeted, and the topics <armarker data-markjs="true" class="arSpellingGrammar" id="spelling_id_9" data-spelling-issue-id="9">can be</armarker> even more relevant. In short, there is room to improve your content marketing strategy.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​That being said, it is difficult to prioritize.

attributes.content: ​That being said, it is difficult to prioritize.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​Content Intelligence allows you not only to see what needs to be improved but also to decide what you should tackle first.

attributes.content: ​Content Intelligence allows you not only to see what needs <armarker data-markjs="true" class="arSpellingGrammar" id="spelling_id_10" data-spelling-issue-id="10">to be</armarker> improved but also to decide what you should tackle first.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: Maybe through tracking competitors, you discover that you need more images or infographics in your blogs, or that videos under 15 seconds receive more shares than those over 20.

attributes.content: Maybe through tracking competitors, you discover that you need more images or <armarker data-markjs="true" class="arSpellingGrammar" id="spelling_id_11" data-spelling-issue-id="11">infographics</armarker> in your blogs, or that videos under 15 seconds receive more shares than those over 20.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​Having a robust content intelligence platform allows you to identify problem areas and act on them quickly.

attributes.content: ​Having a robust content intelligence platform allows you to identify problem areas and act on them quickly.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: Knowing Which Content to Update

attributes.content: Knowing Which Content to Update

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: How many times have you created an excellent piece of content, but forgot about it over time?

attributes.content: How many times have you created an excellent piece of content, but forgot about it over time?

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: ​It was a hit with your audience, and you need reminders to update it. Luckily, a content intelligence platform can assist you.

attributes.content: ​It was a hit with your audience, and you need reminders to update it. Luckily, a content intelligence platform can assist you.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: Instead of combing through a content calendar created on Excel or Google Sheets, a content intelligence platform automatically reminds you of when it is time to update your evergreen content.

attributes.content: Instead of combing through a content calendar created on Excel or Google Sheets, a content intelligence platform automatically reminds you of when it is time to update your evergreen content.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: This tactic ensures that you are efficiently repurposing older content that can still be of value to your audience.

attributes.content: This tactic ensures that you are efficiently repurposing older content that can still be of value to your audience.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: Content Intelligence in Action

attributes.content: Content Intelligence in Action

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: We have evolved from merely tracking page views, click-throughs, and general audience data to using Big Data to produce personalized and timely content. The future possibilities of content intelligence are endless.

attributes.content: We have evolved from merely tracking page views, click-throughs, and general audience data to using Big Data to produce personalized and timely content. The future possibilities of content intelligence are endless.

name: core/paragraph
originalContent: While this extends to many industries and sectors, this evolution in AI will specifically allow content intelligence to continue to grow in sophistication.

attributes.content: While this extends to many industries and sectors, this evolution in AI will specifically allow content intelligence to continue to grow in sophistication.
